segments.text: I really want to switch things up .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think I want to try a new style .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What would you like me to do ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I want you to cut my hair shorter .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I want my hair to be only a few inches long .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you really want it that short ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I've been wanting it short for a while now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If you really want me to , then I'll do it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm absolutely sure that this is what I want .
segments.speaker: S1
